subject_labels: Configure cluster autoscaler with priority-based node selection
Implement pod security standards with restricted baseline
Enable EKS control plane logging to CloudWatch for audit, authenticator, and API logs
Configure OIDC provider for IRSA (IAM Roles for Service Accounts)
EKS cluster must use Kubernetes version 1.28 or higher
Use Pulumi Go SDK v3.x with strongly typed resource definitions
Use managed node groups with custom launch templates
Node groups must use Bottlerocket AMI for enhanced security
Implement Calico network policies for inter-pod traffic control
author: mayanksethi-turing
